main.name: Caleb Delicieux
main.description: Full Stack React & JS Developer by Day, Founder && Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: My name is Caleb aka C@lDev, I'm a Full Stack React and JavaScript Developer. I discovered programming since 2016 where I started with the C language and then switched to C++. In 2018, I started in web development, so I learned HTML, CSS and JS which will become my favorite hobby and my field of work. Today, I work with some of the most popular tools, among them React JS of which I have become a fan. I am Determined, Responsible, Curious to learn, Patient, Cooperative, etc... So the best profile to do your job. Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Look, I'm familiar with some of the best and newest tools on the market.

work.title: Team Member && Fullstack Developper
work.description: Building Apps and Website. Helping others to progress in coding.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
